articles.description: What do you think the next big development or trend in DeFi will be?

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: Replicated Security Live on Cosmos The Cosmos v9-Lambda Upgrade is completed and Replicated Security (the first version of Interchain Security) is now live. The upgrade will benefit the consumer chains with additional security and ATOM stakers will have more staking rewards.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Replicated Security Live on Cosmos, Shapella Live on Goerli, Automated LPing, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: Euler Exploit Updates Euler was hacked for nearly $200M. due to a vulnerability that allowed the attacker to ‚Äúcreate an unbacked token debt position by donating funds to the Euler‚Äôs reserves‚Äù. As a result, ‚Äúthe attacker was able to liquidate these underwater accounts and profit from the liquidation bonuses.‚Äù
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Euler Exploit Updates, Gearbox V3 Coming, Smart Contract Wallet, and More...

articles.author: Ellie
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - USDC Depeg, Euler Exploit, Sunsetting Aztec Connect, and More...

articles.author: Ellie
articles.description: Hedera HTS Exploit Attackers exploited Hedera and transferred away tokens from dApps using the Hedera Token Service (HTS). Hedera turned off mainnet proxies while the team is working on a solution. Convex Live on Polygon Convex is now live on Polyon. Initial pools including aMATICb+WMATIC, axlUSDC+USDC, CRV+amDAI+amUSDC+amUSD+amWBTC+amWETH, etc.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Hedera HTS Exploit, Convex Live on Polygon, Low-Risk Yield, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: IndexCoop gtcETH Live IndexCoop launches gtcETH, a staked ETH index with diversified allocation on RockerPool rETH, Lido stETH, and StakeWise sETH2. Maverick v1 Live Maverick v1 is now live on Ethereum. Maverick AMM automates the concentration of liquidity as price moves to increase capital efficiency.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - IndexCoop gtcETH Live, Maverick v1 Live, Tranched LPing, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: LsETH Live Liquid Collective launches lsETH, an ETH staking service that provides KYC/AML compliance. LsETH is now supported on Coinbase Prime and Bitcoin Suisse. Compound V3 on Polygon Compound V3 is now live on Polygon, allowing users to borrow USDC using major assets as collateral.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - LsETH Live, Compound V3 on Polygon, Yield Vaults on Optimism, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: PancakeSwap V3 Coming Pancakeswap sets to launch V3 the first week of April. Early and new LPs will be eligible to receive airdrops and an NFT. MEV on Osmosis Osmosis will launch ProtoRev in the upcoming V15 upgrade. ProtoRev is a revenue module that captures MEV as protocol revenue and is expected to generate $10k - $35k per $100m in DEX volume.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - PancakeSwap V3 Coming, MEV on Osmosis, Yields Across Convex and Curve, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Uniswap Wallet Live, Cross-chain vePENDLE, Alpha Homora Iron Bank Drama, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: Pendle Live on Arbitrum Yield tokenization protocol Pendle expands to Arbitrum. Pendle also integrated with GMX to support its LP token GLP. Ethereum Account Abstraction EIP-4337 is now live on the Ethereum mainnet. The EIP enables Account Abstraction - a standard for giving wallets smart contract functionality.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Pendle Live on Arbitrum, Ethereum Account Abstraction, Farming on Polygon, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: Reserve eUSD Live Reserve launches Electronic Dollar (eUSD) on Ethereum and the MobileCoin chain. eUSD is backed by a basket of stablecoin derivatives (cUSDC, cUSDT, aUSDC, aUSDT) using Compound and Aave, and 100% of the yield that eUSD generates is directed to RSR stakers
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Reserve eUSD Live, Maker Reactivates D3M, Stable Farming on Osmosis, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: Coinbase L2 Coniabse launched the testnet of Base, an Ethereum L2 built with the OP stack. The team does not plan to launch any token but announces the Base Ecosystem Fund to support early-stage projects building on Base. Synthetix V3 Deployed Synthetix deployed V3 on Ethereum mainnet and Optimism after audits.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Coinbase L2, Synthetix V3 Live, Innovative Perp Trading, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: Collab.Land Token Launch Collab.Land, a Discord/Telegram wallet connection bot protocol, will launch its token and enable claims on Feb 23 at 6 pm MT. Verified community members and/or Membership/Patron NFT holders are eligible for the token drop. Frax to Fully Collateralize Its Stablecoin
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Collab.Land Token Launch, Frax to Fully Collateralize Its Stablecoin, Treasury Yields, and More...

articles.description: Coinbase to Support EUROC Coinbase will add support for EUROC on Ethereum and will enable trading for EUROC pairs after 9 AM PT on 22 February 2023. Perennial Live on Arbitrum Cash-settled derivatives protocol Perennial launches on Arbitrum. Check our
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Coinbase to Support EUROC, Perennial Live on Arbitrum, NFT Aggregator Potential Airdrop , and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: Revert Exploit AMM liquidity management protocol Revert confirmed that their ‚Äúv3utils‚Äù contract was hacked, and 90% of the funds were stolen from a single account. The team stated that they would compensate each victim and provide a post-mortem soon.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Revert Exploit, Hong Kong to Relax Crypto Ban, NFT Lending, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: Flashbots MEV-Share Research firm Flashbots proposes MEV-Share, a matchmaking protocol that shares MEV (Maximal Extractable Value) gains with Ethereum users. According to the proposal, MEV-Share would be an early implementation of SUAVE, which is a blockchain that would aim to decentralize the block-building process.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Flashbots MEV-Share, Kava 12 Live, Borrow to Earn, and More...

articles.author: ùïØùñÜùñìùñåùñäùñó
articles.description: Blur Token Live NFT marketplace Blur launched its native token BLUR and airdropped 360m of tokens to the participants of the season 1 campaign. Season 2 also began and traders can earn points for future rewards by bidding/listing NFTs on the marketplace.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Blur Token Launch, Pendulum Live, Passive Yield on Stablecoin, and More...
